00024 int ProcessOneFile(const char* filename)
00025 {
00026   Message(INFO)<<"\n***************************************\n"
00027                <<"  Processing File "<<filename
00028                <<"\n***************************************\n";
00029   EventHandler* modules = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00030   modules->AllowDatabaseAccess(false);
00031   Reader reader(filename);
00032   if(!reader.IsOk())
00033     return 1;
00034   if(modules->Initialize()){
00035     Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to initialize all modules.\n";
00036     return 1;
00037   }
00038   
00039   //read through the file and process all events
00040   time_t start_time = time(0);
00041   int evtnum;
00042 
00043   //  nev = reader.GetNumEvents();
00044   //  Message(INFO)<<"Events in file "<< nev << std::endl;
00045 
00046   evtnum = 0;
00047   while(reader.IsOk() && !reader.eof()){
00048     if(read_event == nevents) 
00049       break;
00050     if(read_event%500 == 0)
00051       Message(INFO)<<"Processed "<<read_event<< " events " << std::endl;
00052 
00053     //    evtnum = myran.Uniform(1,1000);
00054     RawEventPtr raw = reader.GetEventWithIndex(evtnum);
00055 
00056     //    RawEventPtr raw = reader.GetNextEvent();
00057     if(!raw){
00058       Message(ERROR)<<"Problem encountered reading event "<<evtnum<<std::endl;
00059       continue;
00060     }
00061     Message(DEBUG)<<"Processing event number " << evtnum << " ... ";
00062     modules->Process(raw);
00063     Message(DEBUG)<<"done\n";
00064 
00065     evtnum++;
00066     read_event++;
00067   }
00068   //finish up
00069   modules->Finalize();
00070   Message(INFO)<<"Processed "<<read_event<<" events in "
00071                <<time(0) - start_time<<" seconds. \n";
00072   return 0;
00073 }

00075 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00076 {
00077 
00078   ConfigHandler* config = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00079 
00080   int nrun, nPMT, nsamples, sample, offset, baseline, single_rate, rand_seed;
00081   int pid, phe;
00082 
00083   nrun = 90000;
00084   nevents = 10;
00085   nPMT = 8;
00086   nsamples = 2048;
00087   sample = 4;
00088   offset = 200;
00089   baseline = 0;
00090   single_rate = 0;
00091   rand_seed = 0;
00092 
00093   pid=0; phe=0;
00094 
00095   config->SetProgramUsageString("lasermc [options] <file1> [<file2>, ... ]");
00096 
00097   config->AddCommandSwitch('n',"nevents","number of events to write in output",
00098                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(nevents),
00099                            "N");
00100   config->AddCommandSwitch('r',"run","run number",
00101                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(nrun),
00102                            "9xxxx");
00103   config->AddCommandSwitch('p',"nPMT","number of PMTs",
00104                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(nPMT),
00105                            "N");
00106   config->AddCommandSwitch('s',"nsamples","number of samples",
00107                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(nsamples),
00108                            "N");
00109   config->AddCommandSwitch('z',"sampling","sampling time",
00110                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(sample),
00111                            "ns");
00112   config->AddCommandSwitch('t',"trigger","trigger delay",
00113                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(offset),
00114                            "samples"); 
00115   config->AddCommandSwitch('b',"baseline","PMT baseline common offset",
00116                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(baseline),
00117                            "counts");
00118   config->AddCommandSwitch('x',"ser-rate","PMT SER rate",
00119                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(single_rate),
00120                            "Hz");
00121   config->AddCommandSwitch('g',"ran-seed","TRandom seed",
00122                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(rand_seed),
00123                            "n");
00124   config->AddCommandSwitch('i',"part_id","Particle ID",
00125                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(pid),
00126                            "1=neutron 3=electron");
00127   config->AddCommandSwitch('a',"amplitude","S1 number of phe",
00128                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(phe),
00129                            "<phe>");
00130  
00131   EventHandler* modules = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00132   mcargonscint = modules->AddModule<MCArgonScintillation>();
00133 
00134   config->ProcessCommandLine(argc,argv);
00135   
00136   if(argc < 2){
00137     Message(ERROR)<<"Incorrect number of arguments: "<<argc<<std::endl;
00138     config->PrintSwitches(true);
00139     return 1;
00140   }
00141 
00142   if(nsamples%2) {
00143     nsamples++;
00144     Message(WARNING) << " nsamples should be even !! Corrected to " << nsamples << "\n";
00145   }
00146 
00147   if(nPMT*nsamples > 32768000) {
00148     Message(ERROR) << " number_of_PMTs x number_of_samples exceded limit (100x32768) !!\n ";
00149     return -1;
00150   }
00151 
00152   mcpar = mcargonscint->GetParams();
00153 
00154   mcpar->mch_run_number = nrun;
00155   mcpar->mch_number_of_events = nevents;
00156   mcpar->mch_number_of_channels = nPMT;
00157   mcpar->mch_number_of_samples = nsamples;
00158   mcpar->mch_trigger_delay = offset;
00159   mcpar->mch_baseline = baseline;
00160   mcpar->mch_sampling_time = sample;
00161   mcpar->mch_single_rate = single_rate;
00162 
00163   mcargonscint->Start_Run();
00164   if(rand_seed > 0) mcargonscint->Set_Random_Seed(rand_seed);
00165 
00166   mcargonscint->Set_Pulse(phe);
00167   mcargonscint->Set_Particle(pid);
00168   if((pid != 1) && (pid != 3)) {
00169     Message(ERROR)<<"Error particle not supported yet; quitting\n";
00170     goto skip_process;
00171   }
00172 
00173   read_event = 0;
00174 
00175  again_from_start:
00176   
00177   for(int i = 1; i<argc; i++){
00178     if(ProcessOneFile(argv[i])){
00179       Message(ERROR)<<"Error processing file "<<argv[i]<<"; quitting\n";
00180       break;
00181     }
00182     if(read_event == nevents) break;
00183   }
00184 
00185   if(read_event < nevents) goto again_from_start;
00186 
00187  skip_process:
00188 
00189   mcargonscint->End_Run();
00190 
00191   return 0;
00192 }
